name: redbud
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a deciduous North American bush or small tree (= one that loses its leaves in autumn) with small pink flowers in the spring : Her favourite tree is the redbud. The ornamental cherries and the redbuds are in full bloom. The redbud trees were blossoming, and the air was filled with the scent of lilacs and mimosas.
